detaileddescription.para: Open and parse IEBIN v1 metadata and resolve the weights path.
Open and parse IEBIN v1 metadata and resolve the weights path.

Behavior:
Loads model.ie.json exactly as before.
Additionally checks whether a sibling model.dedup.json exists in the same directory. If present, it opens the dedup loader and records that this weights handle is backed by deduplicated artifacts.

Notes:
This function does not change the public ABI in ie_io.h. It relies on existing spare/opaque fields in ie_weights_t to store the dedup handle.
If your ie_weights_t does not have such a field yet, add: void *dedup_handle; int is_dedup; to ie_io.h (or a private extension struct) and recompile.

Behavior:
Loads model.ie.json exactly as before.
Additionally checks whether a sibling model.dedup.json exists in the same directory. If present, it opens the dedup loader and records that this weights handle is backed by deduplicated artifacts.

Notes:
This function does not change the public ABI in ie_io.h. It relies on existing spare/opaque fields in ie_weights_t to store the dedup handle.
If your ie_weights_t does not have such a field yet, add: void *dedup_handle; int is_dedup; to ie_io.h (or a private extension struct) and recompile.
Touch the weights binary to verify readability (and optionally warm caches).
Touch the weights binary to verify readability (and optionally warm caches).

For deduplicated weights, this function touches the primary backing file (the regular model.ie.bin) exactly as before. The dedup path warm-up is expected to be handled by the dedup loader and/or the mmap layer.

For deduplicated weights, this function touches the primary backing file (the regular model.ie.bin) exactly as before. The dedup path warm-up is expected to be handled by the dedup loader and/or the mmap layer.
Close weights resources (reserved for future use).
Close weights resources (reserved for future use).
This now closes the dedup handle if one was opened.
This now closes the dedup handle if one was opened.

briefdescription.para: Read INT4 quantization metadata from an IEBIN v1 JSON header.

detaileddescription.para: The function scans a relaxed JSON header, locates the "quant" object and extracts fields relevant to INT4 decoding. It resolves scale_bin relative to json_path if needed.

parameterdescription.para: Output metadata (must be non-NULL). On success, out_meta->present is 1 when INT4 metadata is found.

simplesect.para: IE_IO_OK on success (even if no INT4 meta is present), or an ::IE_IO_ERR_* code on I/O/parse errors.

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *packed_path, const char *scales_path, size_t rows, size_t cols, int per_row, float *dst)
memberdef.name: ie_weights_decode_int4

briefdescription.para: Dequantize a packed INT4 weight blob into a float32 matrix.

detaileddescription.para: Reads the packed INT4 blob and the associated scales from disk and produces a row-major float32 matrix into dst (caller-allocated).
The function auto-detects scale dtype between fp16 and fp32 by comparing the file size with the expected number of elements.

parameterdescription.para: Path to scales file. For per-tensor it must contain a single float (fp16 or fp32); for per-row it must contain rows floats.
Non-zero for per-row scales; 0 for per-tensor.

simplesect.para: IE_IO_OK on success, or an ::IE_IO_ERR_* code on failure.

briefdescription.para: Implementation of the IEBIN v1 loader with relaxed JSON parsing.

sect2.title: Design Goals

listitem.para: Zero third-party dependencies (plain C, no JSON libraries).
Safety with -Werror (no unsafe formatting, careful bounds checking).

sect2.para: This module extracts minimal header info from model.ie.json and resolves the path to model.ie.bin. It also exposes a small ie_weights_touch() routine to validate OS-level readability and optionally warm caches.

sect3.title: Deduplicated weights support (lossless)
sect3.para: If a sibling model.dedup.json exists in the same directory as model.ie.json, this loader will prefer it and treat the deduplicated artifacts as the active weights source. This allows drop-in replacement of the model directory without changing engine call sites.

The dedup loader itself is implemented in:
engine/include/io/weights_dedup.h
engine/src/io/weights_dedup.c
This file only decides which representation is available and records enough information for downstream code to route tensor reads accordingly.

sect3.title: INT4 weight-only helpers (exploratory)
sect3.para:
Additional helpers are provided to discover and decode INT4 weight-only metadata from the JSON header and to dequantize packed INT4 blobs into float32 matrices. These helpers are not part of the public ie_io.h API yet; they are provided here to enable incremental integration without changing headers:
ie_weights_read_int4_meta
ie_weights_decode_int4
The decoding helpers depend on ie_quant_int4.h for packing rules and dequantization routines.
